ORM and Migrations Bugs.description: Issues in models/ORM behavior, model inheritance, choices resolution, relationship validation hints, and migration generation for inner classes

Request Routing and HTTP Parsing.description: Bugs in URL parameter handling and HTTP date parsing per RFC specifications

Developer Tooling (Autoreload and Test F.description: Failures in developer utilities such as the autoreloader and TransactionTestCase rollback serialization

Internationalization and Language Settin.description: Validation issues related to language codes and translation system checks

Security and Error Reporting Sanitizatio.description: Insufficient cleaning of settings in exception reports leading to potential information exposure
